00015 /// \file
00016 /// Provides the feedback instructions.
00017 
00018 #include <machine.hpp>
00019 #include <instructions.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace Instructions {
00022     
00023     /// \name Feedback
00024     /// \{
00025     
00026     namespace {
00027         Index INIT_FEEDBACK_state_index;
00028         
00029         void INIT_FEEDBACK_set_state(Machine & machine){
00030             machine.state[INIT_FEEDBACK_state_index].data = machine.stack.peek();
00031         }
00032     }
00033     
00034     /// Get and (if needed) initialize a state variable.
00035     /**
00036      * \note A state variable will be reset when no feedback instruction is used on it in a single run.
00037      *       It will be reinitialized by the next time INIT_FEEDBACK is executed.
00038      * 
00039      * \param Int8 The index of the state variable.
00040      * \param Address The function to give the initial value, if not yet set.
00041      * 
00042      * \return Data The value of the state variable.
00043      */
00044     void INIT_FEEDBACK(Machine & machine){
00045         Index state_index = machine.nextInt8();
00046         Address initialization_function = machine.stack.popAddress();
00047         machine.state[state_index].is_executed = true;
00048         machine.state[state_index].thread = machine.current_thread;
00049         if (machine.state[state_index].data.isSet()){
00050             machine.stack.push(machine.state[state_index].data);
00051         } else {
00052             INIT_FEEDBACK_state_index = state_index;
00053             machine.call(initialization_function, INIT_FEEDBACK_set_state);
00054         }
00055     }
00056     
00057 #if MIT_COMPATIBILITY != MIT_ONLY
00058     /// Set a state variable.
00059     /**
00060      * \param Int8 The index of the state variable.
00061      * \param Data The new value for the state variable.
00062      * 
00063      * \return Data The new value of the state variable.
00064      */
00065     void SET_FEEDBACK(Machine & machine){
00066         Index state_index = machine.nextInt8();
00067         machine.state[state_index].data = machine.stack.peek();
00068         machine.state[state_index].is_executed = true;
00069     }
00070 #endif
00071     
00072     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00073     void FEEDBACK(Machine & machine){
00074         Index state_index = machine.nextInt8();
00075         Data value = machine.stack.pop();
00076         machine.state[state_index].data = value;
00077         machine.state[state_index].is_executed = true;
00078         machine.stack.pop(1);
00079         machine.stack.push(value);
00080     }
00081     
00082     /// \}
00083     
00084 }
